#summary Installation guide

= Required software =

 * Java (version > 1.5)
 * Python 
 * Matlab 
 * ffmpeg
 * ImageMagick

= Quick install guide =

 # Download the latest release from Download page.
 # Set *`$CAPATH`* environment variable.
  * *MacOSX*: Add *`export CAPATH="<path to softwarestudies directory>"`* to the end of the your *~/.profile*.For example, on Giza, we use *`export CAPATH="/Users/culturevis/Documents/Programming/softwarestudies"`*  
 # _Optional_ Add scripts directory to *`$PATH`*. Although this is not needed, it is highly recommended.
  * *MaxOSX*: Add *`export PATH="$CAPATH/scripts:$PATH"`* right after where you define *`$CAPATH`*
 # Run *test-cascript* from command line. If you don't see any *`[FAILED]`*, then you are good to go.
